summary: At a cold, desolate, northmost outpost in Canada, an archaeological discovery is made. A specialist arrives Nov. 1. Strange things happen. All contact with the outside world is down.
cast: Shane Twerdun|Michael Dickson|Carl Toftfelt|Marc Anthony Williams|Andrew Moxham|Timothy Lyle|Steve Bradley|Nathaniel Gordon|Bryce McLaughlin|Kelvin Bonneau|Cameron Tremblay|Fleetwood Addison-Szostakiwskyj
title: Black Mountain Side
